speaker: Gary
dialog: Hey! Who turned out the light?! Damn! Right before finals too.

speaker: Virgil
dialog: Quiet, my child. Be not afraid.

speaker: Virgil
dialog: *sigh* Ok, so. A student here has made a dire mistake. The Book of the Dead, the Necronomicon, has been left unsealed!

speaker: Virgil
dialog: Demons have lept from its pages and are rampaging throughout the school. Luckily, they are contained within the university for now, but we don't have much time.

speaker: Virgil
dialog: Dearest Gary. I need your help to banish this evil back to the depths of Hell.

speaker: Gary
dialog: ME! How can I even help?! I'm just a student here.

speaker: Virgil
dialog: Well, nobody else is still here at this hour! SO I DON'T REALLY HAVE A CHOICE, DO I?!

speaker: Virgil
dialog: Excuse me... Ahem. Dearest Gary. The demons have ripped the ritual pages from the Necronomicon, and hidden them throughout the school.

speaker: Virgil
dialog: Take this holy lantern to light your path through the darkness. Use its light to outsmart those dreadful demon, find the missing ritual pages to send those bastards back to Hell.

speaker: Virgil
dialog: Please help me, Dearest Gary, You're my only hope.
